name: ems-web-app-view-container
author: Chris Spence (https://educationalmediasolutions.com)
description: This angular.io module includes a component and service that can be used to render nested view containers that transition between screens (e.g., a tab container).

scripts.publish: git add -A . && git commit -m 'prepublish npm package' && npm version patch && ng build view-container && cd dist && npm publish
